title: How to set up an alarm that sounds upon reaching a destination on an Android device - Quora

response.answer_text: You can set it up along side your google app which of course google know more about us than we do… anyways you need to have almost all of the invasive features of your google account turned on ie location history and web and app history and then you can create a whole routine through the google assistant application to idk silence all notifications from a side bitch when you reach your home where the wife is located upon arrival at your house you can have the assistant silence all of your calls and messages from a certain hidden contact idk maybe hidden inside of a pic or maybe a sticker where no one knows that the sticker or picture of the hot rod is really an encrypted contact

You’d have to code a program that would tie it to a GPS location. On the other hand if you just input your destination into most navigation programs, they will announce your arrival at your destination.
